steps.name: Given I have configured a secret with admin credentials to a remote Database service
When I request an DBMS Capability  with its name and namespace explicitly specified, provisioned externally
and it is owned by the ProvidedCapability to ensure only changes from the ProvidedCapability will change the implementing Kubernetes resources
and its host, port and database name reflect the connection info provided in the CapabilityRequirement
and the ProvidedCapability's status carries the name of the correct admin secret to use
and to the previously configured hostname of the database service
And the provided Database connection info reflects the external service

labels.name: feature
labels.value: As a controller developer, I would like to implement a controller that responds to CapabilityRequirements so that I can extendKubernetes with my own controllers
